net.beaconcontroller.core.web

Class CoreWebManageable

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.beaconcontroller.core.web.CoreWebManageable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IWebManageable, org.springframework.osgi.context.BundleContextAware

    @Controller
@RequestMapping(value="/core")
public class CoreWebManageable
extends Object
implements org.springframework.osgi.context.BundleContextAware, IWebManageable
    This class sets up the web UI component for the structures in net.beaconcontroller.core and related "platform" related input/output. It uses the net.beaconcontroller.web mgmt framework /
    Author:
    Kyle Forster (kyle.forster@bigswitch.com), David Erickson (daviderickson@cs.stanford.edu)

    • Nested Class Summary

      protected class  CoreWebManageable.makeFlowStatsRequest 
      protected static interface  CoreWebManageable.OFSRCallback
      Used to retrieve the OpenFlow request objects for the statistics request
